message: Starting file locking implementation. Reading analysis document and current codebase to understand exact requirements.

Completed code analysis. Identified 4 critical registry access points without file locking: deploy_headless_agent (2171-2437), update_agent_progress (4547-4563), kill_real_agent (3907-3920), get_status auto-cleanup (2511-2547). Starting implementation of LockedRegistryFile context manager.

Successfully implemented LockedRegistryFile context manager and 5 atomic utility functions (atomic_add_agent, atomic_update_agent_status, atomic_increment_counts, atomic_decrement_active_count, atomic_mark_agents_completed). Now replacing registry access in deploy_headless_agent function.

Waiting for other agents to complete their modifications. Will apply file locking to registry operations once file stabilizes. The LockedRegistryFile and atomic utility functions are already implemented.
Coordinating with other agents. Waiting for file modifications to stabilize before applying atomic registry operations. Core infrastructure (LockedRegistryFile + 5 atomic functions) is ready.

File locking infrastructure COMPLETE. Implemented LockedRegistryFile context manager with fcntl exclusive locking + 5 atomic utility functions (311 lines). Infrastructure ready for integration into 4 registry access points. Comprehensive documentation created in output/FILE_LOCKING_IMPLEMENTATION.md with integration plan, testing plan, and rollout strategy. Integration pending due to file contention with other agents.
